translation: Om [mouth*li] 薩婆薩遏[mouth*li]他悉地捺多曳他努伽刈車都含勃陀肥灑焰布娜囉伽摩娜耶鉢頭摩穆誦是明呪結合蓮花印。
He raises it and spreads it over his head.
Again, as before, he sends it out with a jeweled chariot.
When the dhāraṇī of the seal is sent forth, he deflects it outwardly.

source_sentence: 誦斯呪時亦憶解自身所想布字。
translation: When he recites this dhāraṇī, he also remembers and understands the word pudgala that he imagines for himself.
After he uses the teaching, he'll recite it.

source_sentence: 然後禮佛而退念誦門竟。
translation: Then, he bowed to the Buddha and withdrew from the recitation gate.

source_sentence: 願我傳斯妙法門　　遵修之者幸速成
translation: May I transmit to you this teaching of the Dharma! Those who follow it will quickly attain enlightenment.

source_sentence: 用此微善周法界　　三世利樂無窮盡
translation: Through these subtle virtues, he extends the universe; his benefits and blessings will be inexhaustible to all living beings.

source_sentence: 觀自在大悲成就瑜伽蓮花部念誦法門一卷
translation: One Fascicle of the Recitation Dharma-Door of the Yoga of the Accomplishment of Great Compassion by the Self- Contemplate of Meditation on the Teachings of the Lotus School:
